io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils

Class CrossViewStatePresenter<ViewState,View extends StatelessView<ViewState>>

  • io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.CrossViewStatePresenter<ViewState,View>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectablePresenter<View>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BarcodeCameraPresenter, BatchBarcodeListPresenter

    public class CrossViewStatePresenter<ViewState,View extends StatelessView<ViewState>>
implements ConnectablePresenter<View>

    Presenter which stores view state between .resume and .pause and applies the latest view state to the view on next .resume.

    See Also:
    .resume, .pause, .resume

    • Constructor Detail

      • CrossViewStatePresenter

        public CrossViewStatePresenter()

        Presenter which stores view state between .resume and .pause and applies the latest view state to the view on next .resume.

        See Also:
        .resume, .pause, .resume

    • Method Detail

      • getState

        @Nullable
protected ViewState getState()

      • setState

        protected void setState(@Nullable
                        ViewState p)

      • resume

        public void resume(@NotNull
                   View view)

        Called when presenter should resume operations.

        Parameters:
        view - which will be used to display data.

      • pause

        public void pause()

        Called when presenter should pause operation. This is the default state. At this state view will never be updated even if some long-running operation completes after this point.

      • back

        public boolean back()

        Called when presenter should navigate back.

        Returns:
        true if call is processed, false if call should be processed by parent or not supported.

      • updateState

        public void updateState(ViewState state)

        Updates state of the current view or stores state until view is available.
